00113 O_state* O_state::rec_upSLT(list<O_state*>* path, int ctxtmin)
00114 {
00115         if (suff.second >= ctxtmin)
00116         {
00117                 path->push_front(suff.first);
00118                 return suff.first->rec_upSLT(path, ctxtmin);
00119         }
00120         else
00122                 return this;
00123 }
00124 
00129 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::rec_downSLT(list<pair<O_state*,int> >* SLTlist, int ctxtmin)
00130 {
00131         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::const_iterator rit;
00132         for (rit = rsuff.begin(); rit != rsuff.end(); rit++)
00133         {
00134                 if ((*rit).second >= ctxtmin)
00135                 {
00136                         SLTlist->push_back((*rit));
00137                         (*rit).first->rec_downSLT(SLTlist, ctxtmin);
00138                 }
00139         }
00141         return SLTlist;
00142 }
00143 
00148 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::rec_sortSLT(list<pair<O_state*,int> >* SLTlist, int ctxtmin, int ctxt)
00149 {
00150         list<pair<O_state*,int> > sorted_rsuff = rsuff;
00151         sorted_rsuff.sort(sort_rsuff);
00152         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::reverse_iterator rit;
00153         for (rit = sorted_rsuff.rbegin(); rit!=sorted_rsuff.rend(); ++rit)
00154         {
00155                 if ((*rit).second >= ctxtmin)
00156                 {
00157                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(SLTlist,ctxtmin,min(ctxt,(*rit).second));
00158                         pair<O_state*,int> node = (*rit);
00159                         node.second=min(node.second,ctxt);
00160                         SLTlist->push_back((node));
00161                 }
00162         }
00164         return SLTlist;
00165 }
00166 
00170 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::sortedSLT(int ctxtmin, int nbMaxSol)
00171 {
00172         int NbSol;
00173         list<pair<O_state*,int> > * solutions = new list<pair<O_state*,int> >;
00174         
00175         rec_sortSLT(solutions,ctxtmin);
00176         NbSol = solutions->size();
00177         
00178         O_state * Node = this;
00179         O_state * upNode = suff.first;
00180         int currentCtxt = suff.second;
00181         list<pair<O_state*,int> > sorted_rsuff;
00182         while (NbSol<=nbMaxSol && Node->suff.second>=ctxtmin && upNode!=NULL)
00183         {
00184                 pair<O_state*,int> father = Node->suff;
00185                 currentCtxt=father.second;
00186                 solutions->push_back(father);
00187                 sorted_rsuff = upNode->rsuff;
00188                 sorted_rsuff.sort(sort_rsuff);
00189                 list<pair<O_state*,int> >::reverse_iterator rit;
00190                 for (rit = sorted_rsuff.rbegin(); (*rit).first!=Node; ++rit)
00191                 {
00192                         pair<O_state*,int> brother = (*rit);
00193                         brother.second=currentCtxt;
00194                         solutions->push_back(brother);
00195                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(solutions, ctxtmin, currentCtxt);
00196                 }
00197                 NbSol = solutions->size();
00198                 if (NbSol>=nbMaxSol)
00199                         break;
00200                 else
00201                 {
00202                         for (++rit; rit!=sorted_rsuff.rend(); ++rit)
00203                         {
00204                                 pair<O_state*,int> brother = (*rit);
00205                                 if (brother.second>=ctxtmin)
00206                                 {
00207                                         brother.second=min(brother.second,currentCtxt);
00208                                         solutions->push_back(brother);
00209                                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(solutions, ctxtmin, min(brother.second,currentCtxt));
00210                                 }
00211                                 NbSol = solutions->size();
00212                                 if (NbSol>=nbMaxSol)
00213                                         break;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216                 upNode = upNode->suff.first;
00217                 Node = Node->suff.first;
00218         }
00219         return solutions;
00220 }

00226 
00234 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, O_state & statein)
00235 {
00236         list<O_state*>::const_iterator transit;
00237         out<<"  {"<<endl;
00238         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" [target = "<<statein.get_bufferef()<<"]"<<endl;
00239         for (transit = statein.trans.begin(); transit != statein.trans.end(); transit++)
00240         {
00241                 if (transit == statein.trans.begin())
00242                         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<(*transit)->get_statenb()<<endl;
00243                 else
00244                         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<(*transit)->get_statenb()<<" [constraint = false]"<<endl;
00245         }
00246         out<<"          "<<endl;
00247         if (statein.get_suffix().first != NULL)
00248                 out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<statein.suff.first->get_statenb()<<" [label = "<<statein.suff.second<<", constraint = false, style = dotted]"<<endl;
00249         out<<"  }"<<endl;
00250         return(out);
00251 }

00253 
00254 bool sort_rsuff (pair<O_state*,int> rsuff1, pair<O_state*,int> rsuff2)
00255 {
00256         if (rsuff1.second==rsuff2.second)
00257                 return ((rsuff1.first->get_statenb())<(rsuff2.first->get_statenb()));
00258         else
00259                 return (rsuff1.second<rsuff2.second);
00260 }

00273 O_oracle::~O_oracle()

00276         for(O_it = state_vect.begin();O_it != state_vect.end();O_it++)
00277                 delete *O_it;

00287 void O_oracle::freestates()
00288 {
00289         vector<O_state*>::reverse_iterator O_it;
00290         for(O_it = state_vect.rbegin();O_it != state_vect.rend();++O_it)
00291         {
00292                 delete *O_it;
00293                 state_vect.pop_back();
00294         }
00295         size = state_vect.size();
00296 }
00297 
00298 void O_oracle::resolve_trans()
00299 {
00300         vector<O_state*>::iterator O_it;
00301         for(O_it = state_vect.begin();O_it != state_vect.end();O_it++)
00302         {
00303                 list<O_state*> translist = (*O_it)->get_trans();
00304                 (*O_it)->reset_trans();
00305                 list<O_state*>::iterator transit;
00306                 for (transit = translist.begin();transit != translist.end();transit++)
00307                 {
00308                         
00309                         (*O_it)->add_trans(this->operator[]((long)(*transit)));
00310                         //cout <<"resolved index: "<<(*O_it)->get_trans().back()->get_statenb()<<endl;
00311                 }
00312                 translist.reverse();
00313         }
00314 }

00336 // initialisation
00338 void O_oracle::start()
00339 {
00340         if(size <= 0)
00341         {
00342                 O_state * newstate = new O_state(0);
00343                 state_vect.push_back(newstate);
00344                 size = state_vect.size();
00345         }
00346 }

00348 // operators overload
00350 O_state * O_oracle::operator[] (int i) const
00351 {
00352         if (this!= NULL && size>0 && i<size)
00353                 return(state_vect[i]);
00354         else
00355                 return NULL;
00356 }

00369 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, const O_oracle & oraclein)
00370 {       
00371         vector<O_state*>::const_iterator O_it;
00372         out<<"digraph "<<oraclein.name<<endl;
00373         out<<"{"<<endl;
00374         out<<"  graph [rankdir=LR];"<<endl;
00375         out<<"  node [shape=circle];"<<endl;
00376         out<<"  nodesep = 0.2;"<<endl<<endl;
00377                 
00378         for(O_it = oraclein.state_vect.begin(); O_it != oraclein.state_vect.end(); O_it++)
00379                 out<<**O_it<<endl;
00380         
00381         out<<"}"<<endl;
00382         return(out);
